decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s):

A100 12/07 (LOCATION PLAN); A101 12/07 (EXISTING AND PROPOSED BLOCK PLAN); A102 28/08 (EXISTING AND PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN); A103 12/07 (EXISTING AND PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN); A104 12/07 (EXISTING AND PROPOSED ROOF PLAN); A205 12/07 (EXISTING AND PROPOSED ELEVATIONS); A206 28/08 (EXISTING AND PROPOSED ELEVATIONS); A307 12/07 (EXISTING AND PROPOSED SECTIONS); A408 12/07 (PROPOSED DOOR AND WINDOW DETAILS); QUOTATION (7 PAGES) DATED 03/07/2024; DESIGN AND ACCESS STATEMENT (F-LINE DESIGNS); HERITAGE STATEMENT (GREEN CODE ARCHITECTURE)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application and the plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), and the Ealing Local Plan (Reg 19) (2024).
description: Alterations to the ground floor rear and side elevations involving the insertion of French doors and windows to the rear elevation and replacement of one window and installation of two windows on side elevation
